name: Slimy Sam Codes a Robot Ship
name_original: Slimy Sam Codes a Robot Ship
description: This is my little game for Wowie Jam 4.0. Play as Slimy Sam and solve puzzles by coding a little robot ship with blocks. Use WASD to move and jump, Space to grab and drop code blocks, and R to restart the level. I know the physics are broken, If you get a block stuck in the wall just restart :(
